text: obata pera ikutva giya nuh, ad, samud væni janatavange itihasayanda, ovungen pasu pæmini ayage itihasayanda, obata læbune nædda? ovunva (ovunge vistara) allah hæra vena kisivekutat dæna gata nohæka. ema janatava veta yavanu læbu (apage) dutayin pæhædili sadhakayan samaga ovun veta pæmina “(rju margayata enu, enu” yayi tamange dætama digu kara aradhana kala) avasthavedi ovunge at ovunge kata desatama tallu kara dama (ovunta) “niyata vasayenma api (deviyange dutayin yanna prakara) oba gena a dæya pratiksepa karannemu. tavada oba apava kumak desata aradhana karannehuda, e gæna niyata vasayenma api imahat vu sækayehima sitinnemu” yayi pævasuha
